(Left is decreasing x, Right is increasing x, Up is decreasing y, Down is increasing y)
(row = 6, col = 2)
=== Last Position ===
(row = 6, col = 2)

The avatar is at (6, 2). The goal is to survive for 1000 time steps without any citizens becoming cursed. Demons at (1, 6) and (1, 15) shoot bolts, while angels at (1, 24) and (1, 29) shoot salvation. Citizens spawn from the input at (12, 31) and head towards the output at (12, 0). There are boxes around.
Since the current position is the same as the last position, I need to try a different action. There are boxes at (4, 4), (4, 5), (4, 7), etc. I can try moving to the right.
Action: 2
